Title: Area
Description: The object being described concerns an area.

Title: Metering point
Description: The object being described concerns a metering point.

Title: Party
Description: The object being described concerns a party.

Description: The object being described concerns a resource object.

Description: The object being described concerns a tieline.

Title: Resource type

Title: DC link
Description: The object being described concerns a DC link.

Title: AC link
Description: The object being described concerns an AC link.

Title: Merchant line
Description: The object being described concerns a merchant line.

Title: Bidding zone
Description: The largest geographical area within which market participants are able to exchange energy without capacity allocation.

Title: Virtual bidding zone
Description: A non-geographical bidding zone to be able to apply extra constraints to Bidding Zones.

Title: Metering grid area
Description: A physical area where consumption, production and exchange can be measured. It is delimited by the placement of meters for continuous measurement for input to, and withdrawal from the area.

Title: Scheduling area
Description: An area within which the TSOs' obligations regarding scheduling apply due to operational or organisational needs.

Title: Exchange point
Description: The object being described concerns an exchange point.
